name: Asterios
description:
(Asterios themes of an adult nature - you must be 18 or older to play.) Asterios tells the story of Hypildi, a human born without Astros.  An Astros is a power that almost the entire population possesses.  Oppressed for his difference, his peers take him to the brink of death. An unknown hand full of hope reaches out to him.  Will he seizes  it and protect what is dear to him ?

The game is arround 20k word for the moment !

Patreon : https://patreon.com/AsteriosProject?utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter&utm_cam... follow me here for early access content ! Twitter :  @AsteriosProject Discord : https://discord.gg/5nC5ZfhCMZ

If you can't download the game reach me on twitter / discord and i will give you the link.
